panels.description: Estimated cost of running current OpenStack workloads on VMware infrastructure. This metric calculates what the organization would pay for VMware licenses.
panels.title: Annual saving VMware Equivalent Infrastructure License Cost

panels.description: Price of Licenses change a year, list price
panels.title: VMware License Cost Change (over Time period)

targets.expr:
(sum(openstack_placement_resource_usage{resourcetype="MEMORY_MB",os_region=~"$cluster"}) * 100)/
(sum(openstack_placement_resource_total{resourcetype="MEMORY_MB",os_region=~"$cluster"} * on(hostname) 
  (openstack_nova_agent_state{os_region=~"$cluster",service="nova-compute"} == 1 and 
   openstack_nova_agent_state{adminState="enabled",os_region=~"$cluster",service="nova-compute"} == 1)) - 
sum(openstack_placement_resource_reserved{os_region=~"$cluster",resourcetype="MEMORY_MB"} * on(hostname) 
  (openstack_nova_agent_state{os_region=~"$cluster",service="nova-compute"} == 1 and 
   openstack_nova_agent_state{adminState="enabled",os_region=~"$cluster",service="nova-compute"} == 1)) - 
2*max(openstack_placement_resource_total{os_region=~"$cluster",resourcetype="MEMORY_MB"} * on(hostname) 
  (openstack_nova_agent_state{os_region=~"$cluster",service="nova-compute"} == 1 and 
   openstack_nova_agent_state{adminState="enabled",os_region=~"$cluster",service="nova-compute"} == 1)))
